attributes.action: We Request Corona Virus Student Tuition Fee Relief Subsidies.
attributes.additional_details:
Create a tuition fee relief subsidy that lifts The extra financial pressures on the universities themselves As well as the students who are receiving a limited and restricted learning and student experience due to the restrictions of the Covid-19 Pandemic. 

This subsidy should be considered across the board as an award to all students who enrolled on courses starting last September with a partial subsidy offered for those who lost the learning experience from March to July last year.
attributes.background: Due to the corona virus pandemic millions of students in the UK are being completely overlooked and underrepresented By the administration during this global catastrophe. No university in this country can say they are satisfying the contracts for what they sold to us as their student experience.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
